capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for the development and delivery of strategic communications and engagement activities, ensuring quality outcomes.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Manages planning, development, implementation, and evaluation of communication strategies and activities.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Identifies emerging stakeholder issues and synthesizes information for executive consideration.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Advises and works closely with program teams to ensure activities align with departmental policies and procedures.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Leads a small team, engaging and motivating staff to develop their capabilities.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Communicates goals and priorities to the team and recognizes achievements.

capabilities.name: Optimise Business Outcomes
capabilities.description: Manages resources effectively to support strategic communications and engagement activities.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Supports and promotes change related to the Reconnecting River Country Program and other Water Group initiatives.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Manages the delivery of communication materials and channels, ensuring clear and effective communication.

capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Ensures community and stakeholders are informed and have opportunities for feedback.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Works closely with various teams across the department for a coordinated approach to communications and engagement.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Provides expert advice and support to senior executives and business units, influencing engagement strategies.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Applies effective planning, coordination, and control methods to manage communications and engagement projects.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.description: Developing and implementing strategic communication and engagement plans.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Leading a team and managing a diverse range of communication activities.

skills.name: Stakeholder Management
skills.description: Identifying and managing relationships with various stakeholders.

skills.name: Event Management
skills.description: Designing and delivering stakeholder and community events.

generalRole.title: Manager Communications and Engagement
generalRole.description: This role involves leading the development and delivery of strategic communications and engagement activities for government programs, requiring advanced communication, planning, and team management skills.
